name: jodit
description: Jodit is awesome and usefully wysiwyg editor with filebrowser

scripts.concat: concatinator -f jodit.js modules/Dom.js modules/Helper.js config.js modules/*.js plugins/*.js -o build/jodit.full.js
scripts.minify: uglifyjs build/jodit.full.js -c -m -o build/jodit.min.js && lessc --clean-css less/jodit.less build/jodit.min.css
scripts.github: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version %npm_package_version%. Read more http://xdsoft.net/jodit/doc/index.html#%npm_package_version% " && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push --tags origin HEAD:master && npm publish
scripts.build: npm run concat && npm run minify
